title: Episode 278: Prayer, God, & Rihanna (Feat. BIA)
itunes:title: Episode 278: Prayer, God, & Rihanna (Feat. BIA)
description:
Rapper/singer BIA is here to promote her upcoming album “For Certain,” which drops December 11th. BIA opens up about her relationship, including how they wear matching outfits, threesomes not being an option, and even the possibility of marriage. BIA gets personal when explaining the divine timing of how the song ‘Best On Earth’ literally saved her life; she breaks down that time her man embarrassed her in the club, and much more. Enjoy!

Use code ANGELAYEE20 at checkout when purchasing all Urban Skin RX products.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
